body.raw:
{
    "walletGroupId": 32, //account type id, it is optional but if you are going to be using the chart of account feature, you must specify one
    "customerId": {{customerId}},
    "walletClassificationId": 1, //1 = customer account, 2 = internal account
    "currencyId": 1, // 1 = NGN
    "name": "{{$randomFullName}}" // an optional name for the account
}

    "currencyId": 107, // 1 = NGN
    "name": "{{$randomFullName}}" // an optional name for the account
}
